channel.title: Rs-Reborn
channel.description:
Rs-Reborn is a 317 server that is running the 2006scape source
Rs-Reborn is a remake of the years of 2006. Rs-Reborn will help you relive your childhood memories and get away from the terrible new content jagex has put in place of that. We are going to be a 99 % strict remake with decent exp rates and great game play. The server has a 35.0 exp rate!
[url=http://rs-reborn.comoj.com/]http://rs-reborn.comoj.com/[/url]
[b][u]Progress[/u][/b]:
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
[b][u]Client Features[/u][/b]:
- Loading full 377 - Auto cache downloader - Full music system - Enter to login - Ability to use k/m/b with money - Quick reply option for private messages - Multi platform support - Fast client
[b][u]Server Features[/u][/b]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate - Zombie Random
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]:
- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fall chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) - Rock Golem
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]:
- Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [u][b]Smithing[/b][/u]:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b][u]Fishing[/u][/b]: - All fish can be caught - Big net fishing - Correct item requirements - Fishing spots located all around the world - Correct animations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img][u][b] Slayer[/b][/u] - Working slayer gem - Working slayer shop - Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop - Generating task's bound on combatlevel/slayerlevel - Remove task forever for slayer points - Cancel task for slayer points - All slayer masters - All slayer masters can give you the slayer location - XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task
[u][b]Skills to do[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DPd9.gif[/img]-Farming
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]:
- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death) - Perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment - Weapon poisoning
[img]http://www.runerebels.com/images/kevin/sprites/headicons_pk%200.png[/img] [u][b]Bosses[/b][/u]:
-TzTok-Jad -Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [u][b]Random Events[/b][/u]:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken - Swarm - Shade - Whirlpool -Random Event Handling System -No random in tut island, in certain areas, etc...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [u][b]Quests[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]:
- Random event handler that works great with all random events - Skill handler that works great with all skills - Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests - Around 10 random events in place as of now - All skills done to full completion - Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources) - Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.) - Skill interfaces - Pets - Working objects all around the world - Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world - Changelog with 2500 changes now - Christmas Crackers - Holiday events handler - Working desert - Single and double doors - Dupe free guarentee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap). - Runescape guilds - All food that runescape had in 2006 - Normal and ancient magics, ancients is for members only - All runescapes shops that were in 2006 - All runescapes potions - Correct runescape start - Sailing - Gnome Glider - Bank Pins - Correct runescape teleports - Wilderness warning - All rings/amulets loaed - Al kharid/shantay pass w/dialogues & items req - Tele tabs - Tele other - Lots of minigames - Clipping following/npcs - Empty handler added for items that can be emptied - Crystal Chest - Flour Mill - Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed - Update Cache - Members Only Benefits - Runescape prices - Chat filtering - Running/w energy - Magic Carpet - Skill Guides - Same or close to same exp rates as runescape will be voted for - Weapon Poisoning - Music/Sounds
Server PIcs [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72979356/Rs-Reborn/2.PNG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72979356/Rs-Reborn/Capture1.PNG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72979356/Rs-Reborn/Capture2.PNG[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72979356/Rs-Reborn/Capture3.PNG[/img]
I will Add More Pics As I Take Them
Here's A Video [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f2d5fqDBed4[/youtube] Here's One More [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8rSizsus5M8&feature=c4-overview&list=UUn_OJZwQ_oLTYDC6MjipxVg[/youtube]

item.title: Rs-Reborn
item.dc:creator: @jessewhitley jessewhitley
item.description:
@jessewhitley wrote:

Rs-Reborn is a 317 server that is running the 2006scape source

Rs-Reborn is a remake of the years of 2006. Rs-Reborn will help you relive your childhood memories and get away from the terrible new content jagex has put in place of that. We are going to be a 99 % strict remake with decent exp rates and great game play. The server has a 35.0 exp rate!

http://rs-reborn.comoj.com/

Progress:

The red color means the feature has not yet been started.
The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The green color means the feature has been finished.

Client Features:

  • Loading full 377
  • Auto cache downloader
  • Full music system
  • Enter to login
  • Ability to use k/m/b with money
  • Quick reply option for private messages
  • Multi platform support
  • Fast client

Server Features:

Prayer:

  • All bones bury-able
  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
  • Zombie Random

Agility:

  • Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable
  • Force movement mask
  • Correct animations used
  • Run energy affected by weight and level

Firemaking:

  • Correct anims
  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Canâ€™t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them

Woodcutting:

  • Stumps and regrowing trees
  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fall chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree
  • Canoes

Mining:

  • Emptying and refilling rocks
  • All ores can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe finding and animations
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gems
  • Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
  • Mining gems at shilo village
  • Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)
  • Rock Golem

Fletching:

  • All logs can be fletched
  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all

Crafting:

  • Gem cutting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewelry Molding

Thieving:

  • Stall Thieving
  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Times

Cooking:

  • All fishes cookable
  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine

Runecrafting:

  • Altar Enterting
  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss

Herblore:

  • All potions makeable
  • Itentifying herbs
  • Weapon poisioning

Smithing:

  • All bars smithable
  • Smelting
  • Correct anims, working interfaces & objects

Fishing:

  • All fish can be caught
  • Big net fishing
  • Correct item requirements
  • Fishing spots located all around the world
  • Correct animations

Slayer

  • Working slayer gem
  • Working slayer shop
  • Tasks where you are required to wield any special equipment, e.g. boots out of the slayer shop
  • Generating taskâ€™s bound on combatlevel/slayerlevel
  • Remove task forever for slayer points
  • Cancel task for slayer points
  • All slayer masters
  • All slayer masters can give you the slayer location
  • XP after each killed NPC, + XP after finishing task

Skills to do:

-Farming

Combat:

  • PvP fully complete
  • PvN fully complete
  • X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)
  • Perfect max hit formulas
  • Perfect accuracy formula
  • Every weapon special attack
  • Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)
  • Equipment requirements
  • Degradable equipment
  • Weapon poisoning

Bosses:

-TzTok-Jad
-Big Wolf
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor
-Dagganoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagganoth Prime
-Giant Mole

-King Black Dragon

-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady
-Genie
-Rock Golem
-Spirit Tree
-Zombie
-Evil Chicken

  • Swarm
  • Shade
  • Whirlpool
    -Random Event Handling System
    -No random in tut island, in certain areas, etcâ€¦

Quests:

Miscellaneous:

  • Random event handler that works great with all random events
  • Skill handler that works great with all skills
  • Quest handler that works great with f2p or p2p quests
  • Around 10 random events in place as of now
  • All skills done to full completion
  • Water fillables (using vials, buckets, jugs, etc. on water sources)
  • Pickables (cabbages, onions, wheat, etc.)
  • Skill interfaces
  • Pets
  • Working objects all around the world
  • Almost every rs npc spawned all around the world
  • Changelog with 2500 changes now
  • Christmas Crackers
  • Holiday events handler
  • Working desert
  • Single and double doors
  • Dupe free guarentee (If you find a dupe it will be patched asap).
  • Runescape guilds
  • All food that runescape had in 2006

  • All runescapes shops that were in 2006
  • All runescapes potions
  • Correct runescape start

  • Gnome Glider
  • Bank Pins

  • Tele other

  • Clipping following/npcs
  • Empty handler added for items that can be emptied
  • Crystal Chest
  • Flour Mill
  • Logging system for every type of thing to make sure no one gets scammed
  • Update Cache
  • Members Only Benefits
  • Runescape prices
  • Chat filtering
  • Running/w energy
  • Magic Carpet
  • Skill Guides
  • Same or close to same exp rates as runescape will be voted for
  • Weapon Poisoning
  • Music/Sounds
